page.title: 07CHILWELL. Olympia.
page.content: Chilwell Olympia was built in 1974 and it was opened officially by Ian Hallam. He is a racing cyclist. The cost of the building was Â£250,000. The Olympia is open to the school in the day and to the public from 7 o'clock in the morning to 9 o'oclock and then from 5.30 pm to 11 o'clock at night. People can hire rooms or the large hall for parties etc.. The manager has got three assistants. There are 29 sports all together - the most popular sport for men is squash and the most popular for ladies aerobics. The outside 5 a side football pitch has artificial grass and people can play into the night because it has flood lights. 117,000 adults use the centre each year. Stuart Blackley. Meadow Lane School.
